summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CloudNest server renting platform. Backend API testing shows 78.6% success rate with some authentication issues. Frontend testing shows successful loading of all major pages, user registration, admin login, and contact form functionality.

authentication_issues.issue: Returns 403 'Not authenticated' for user endpoints despite valid token
authentication_issues.impact: Blocks user access to orders, servers, invoices, and tickets

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and features
Navigation to VPS, Shared, Dedicated server pages
Pricing page loads with plan types
Admin dashboard loads with stats and management sections
Admin can view orders, servers, users pages
Contact form submission works with success confirmation
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication issues with user endpoints (/api/orders, /api/servers, /api/invoices, /api/tickets) that are returning 403 errors despite valid authentication tokens. The issue appears to be in the token validation middleware for these specific endpoints.
